description: Demonstrates context_ttl: time-to-live for tool results to prevent RAG bloat in multi-turn scenarios

phases.name: multi_turn_search
phases.instructions:
Search for information about: {{ input.topic }}

Use sql_search to find relevant tables. You have multiple turns to refine your understanding.

Turn 1: Do the search
Turn 2: Analyze what you found (RAG results will EXPLODE after this turn)
Turn 3: Make your final decision WITHOUT seeing the RAG dump (it expired!)

Be explicit about what context you can see in each turn.

phases.name: confirm
phases.instructions: Confirm that you received a clean decision from the previous phase, not the full RAG dump. What exactly do you see from the previous phase?
